professionalExperience.name: Software Engineer
professionalExperience.description: I am a highly motivated, self-taught, and passionate Software Engineer with a background in Business Administration and 20+ years of experience in Sales and Marketing. I am currently transitioning to a new career as a Software Engineer with two years of intensive self-study and practical experience in Java, Python, JavaScript, C#, Angular, Spring, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and SCSS through bootcamps and online courses. Currently pursuing a formal Software Engineer degree, committed to a successful transition into the tech industry.
